channel.title: Weird Waves
channel.description: Audio horror broadcasting online, from Old Time Radio to classic horror story audiobooks to freaky modern podcasts.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-09-04
item.description: Added the total number of hours of audio in the site to the stats list.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-08-29
item.description: Refined the list of banger shows (defined in the archive part of the script, only relevant when you click the "Add random banger" button on the site).

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-08-28
item.description: Tweaked subheading margin sizes for better readability.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-08-28
item.description: Added a "copyright-safe" mode that ignores more-recent copyright material when adding random shows or the entire archive to the playlist.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-08-22
item.description: Fixed a minor bug with the "Add series to playlist" buttons.
